scripts.build-host: $package = Get-Content './package.json' -Raw -Encoding ASCII | ConvertFrom-Json & $package.homepage = 'https://www.epic-gtarp.com/front/react/' & $package | ConvertTo-Json -depth 100 | Out-File './package.json' -Encoding ASCII & npm run build
scripts.build-local: $package = Get-Content './package.json' -Raw -Encoding ASCII | ConvertFrom-Json & $package.homepage = '.' & $package | ConvertTo-Json -depth 100 | Out-File './package.json' -Encoding ASCII & npm run build
